document.full_text: seaweed collected from the coast near japan's crippled fukushima nuclear power plant and sewage in tokyo have shown elevated levels of radiation, according to data released by an environmental group and government officials on friday.
document.title: radiation found in seaweed near crippled japan plant
lines_and_colors: seaweed collected from the coast near japan's crippled fukushima nuclear power plant and sewage in tokyo have shown elevated levels of radiation, according to data released by an environmental group and government officials on friday.
